item.description:
Join Boston Uncorked in an intimate walk-around tasting event at Rustic Kitchen, an Italian-Mediterranean bistro where we'll get a little "rustic" in the city with an ode to Italian wines.

Here we'll gather in the Atrium Lounge and indulge in vini d' Italia along with passed and stationary hors d'oeuvres such as:
Assorted Wood Fire Grilled Pizzas
Apulian Style Meatballs
Bruschetta
Wild Mushroom and Goat Cheese Crostini
Arancini of Black Olives in a Spicy Tomato Sauce

Who says you can't get a little rustic in the heart of the Theatre District? It'll be warm and inviting, and the wines will be toasty and luscious.

Note: This is not a CMF event; FYI only. Although this event is sold out, there may be tickets for sale at the "Ticket Exchange Link" at the Boston Uncorked Website.
S.
item.name: Boston Uncorked
